Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "How do you have the time to make something like this when you've barely rested recently...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee puts down the terminal in his hand and takes the mystery box resignedly.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I wonder if I should admire your endless energy or scold you for your poor time management.', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's a rare festival occasion, after all. You want to open it?", 3: '10'}
{3: 'Lee swiftly opens the box and finds a small planetarium globe inside.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The level of detail on these constellations can easily be calculated without this globe.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Lee makes use of the planetarium to explain to you a series of common constellations and their coordinates.'}
{2: '...My computing power is limited to a regular human brain.', 3: '16'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Even humans can work this out... Forget it. Since you realize you're a human, why don't you stick to the resting schedule of one?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Go to sleep. I'll show you any constellation you want to see once you're well-rested, no matter how far away they are.", 4: '1'}
